```{r}
data4 = read.csv("bioChemAll43.csv")
```
```{r}
data42 =data4[-1]
head(data42)
```

```{r}
Rcoef = c()
for (i in 1:length(data42)){
  Rcoef[i] = abs(cor(data42[,"darwinWave_WWSH_0"],data42[i],use="pairwise.complete.obs"))
}
```

```{r}
Rcoef = data.frame(Rcoef,row.names = colnames(data42))

```
